page.title: 15MEDIA
page.content: There are{4 BBC radio stations}that listeners can tune into according to the strength of their{receiver.}It is also possible to listen to Continental programmes. There are several {Commercial}radio stations,{Essex {Radio}being the local one.{'Pirate' radio stations are situated in {International}waters in the North Sea. These are popular with the younger generations as they play constant {'pop' music. {Two BBC}television stations are available and{4 Commercial}stations according to the direction and strength of the{signal. Gareth Rickers age 8. 'On the{radio}I enjoy listening to plays but {television}is better because you can see what is happening.{Children's television is on for about an hour every week day.'
